# Insert Inline Links Test

This tests the insert_inline_links option.

## Introduction

First citation [1](https://example.com/paper-gamma) should become inline link.
Second citation [2](https://example.com/paper-alpha) should become inline link.
Third citation [3](https://example.com/paper-beta) should become inline link.

Multiple citations [1, 2, 3](https://example.com/paper-gamma) should use first URL.

## References

[1]: https://example.com/paper-gamma
[2]: https://example.com/paper-alpha
[3]: https://example.com/paper-beta
